citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm on
08-Mar-17.
(Contacted licensee by phone and he said he would not be home for 2 hours).
